content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Describe one and only one of Athenodorus’s reactions in lines 1-3 (Legit...conducit) to learning about the house before he rents it. Provide the Latin word(s) that support your answer in Part (i). Translate in context the Latin word(s) you cited in Part (ii).

frqParts.text: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Describe one and only one of Athenodorus’s reactions in lines 1-3 (Legit...conducit) to learning about the house before he rents it. Provide the Latin word(s) that support your answer in Part (i). Translate in context the Latin word(s) you cited in Part (ii).

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
